title: Llanelli: Bomb squad called and explosives offences arrest made
article: A man has been arrested on suspicion of explosives offences after a bomb disposal team was called to a house. The 41-year-old is also being held in custody on suspicion of possessing a banned weapon.Dyfed-Powys Police said officers executed a warrant at a property in Llanelli on Thursday. Force vehicles were seen on Alban Road. Specialist officers and equipment were used to ensure people and neighbouring properties were not at risk. A spokesman said: "A specialist search took place, with the assistance of the ambulance and fire services, due to the possible presence of chemicals at the property."
